name: Galactic Warfare
description:
This game is a top down shooter called galactic warfare lots of fun to play it has asteroids and aliens and it has a scoreboard that counts your scores when played but when you quit it resets the controls are wasd to move mouse 1/left click to fire and r to restart. This game was created for a school project based on a tutorial and it took 2 weeks to make the game playable.

I hope you find it fun.
